briefdescription.para: Initializes the notification services module with the given settings. This call is optional and only need to be called if you have custom settings to initialize this feature.
Returns the cached scheduled notification array.

simplesect.para: This property is invalid until a call to GetScheduledNotifications(EventCallback<NotificationServicesGetScheduledNotificationsResult>) is completed.

briefdescription.para: Requests for permission to interact with the user when local and remote notifications are delivered to the user's device.

parameterdescription.para: The authorization options your app is requesting. You may combine the available constants to request authorization for multiple items.
Indicates whether pre-confirmation is required, before prompting system permission dialog.
Callback method that will be invoked after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Gets the notification settings available for this application.

parameterdescription.para: Callback method that will be invoked after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new instance of local notification.
Schedules a local notification for delivery.

parameterdescription.para: Callback method that will be invoked after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Returns a list of all notification requests that are scheduled and waiting to be delivered.

parameterdescription.para: Callback method that will be invoked after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Returns a list of the app’s notifications that are still displayed in Notification Center.

parameterdescription.para: Callback method that will be invoked after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Removes all of the app’s delivered notifications from Notification Center.
Registers to receive remote notifications via Push Notification service.

detaileddescription.para: Call this method to initiate the registration process with Push Notification service. When registration process completes, callback is fired. If registration succeeds, then you should pass device token to the server you use to generate remote notifications.

simplesect.para: If you want your app’s remote notifications to display alerts, play sounds etc you must call the RequestPermission(NotificationPermissionOptions, bool, EventCallback<NotificationServicesRequestPermissionResult>) method before registering for remote notifications.

parameterdescription.para: Callback method that will be invoked after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Unregister for all remote notifications received via Push Notification service.

simplesect.para: Apps unregistered through this method can always re-register.

briefdescription.para: Returns the registeration status for remote notifications.

simplesect.para: true, if registered for remote notifications, false otherwise.
When set to 0, the application badge will be cleared from the icon.

briefdescription.para: Provides cross-platform interface for scheduling, registering and handling notifications.
